Review.Titre: Don't buy, save yourself the heartache
Review.Contenu: Yeah, really, just save your money and go with a better brand. Customer service tries,  but lacks the human empathy trait and the sense to see that the product was applied 24 hours before registering, but my card was swiped the day after the repairs were done, thus, I guess voids the "warranty". Even though it clearly states,  "may void warranty" simply means they have the means to be compassionate and understanding, However, they lack that. I guess with most companies anything to keep a buck right? Told you I'd keep up my original review but, my human empathetic and human understanding have in to change it. So you see, that's how it works in life. This company has not and is not willing to take care of their warranty. You do you, but warning, read the fine print, they'll do anything to get out of it.

Review.Titre: I purchased cellhemlmet liquid glass…
Review.Contenu: I purchased cellhemlmet liquid glass pro+ for my phone.  When the screen broke, I reached out to them multiple time with no communication, come to find out you have to email your claim in (almost impossible to get an actual human on the phone). After 2 weeks I finally received an email backing saying the $100 dollar purchase of liquid glass pro+  was expired.  Long story short this product is garbage, and you should really just pay for phone insurance which is by far superior to this SCAM!

Review.Titre: customer service non responsive
Review.Contenu: customer service non responsive when I had issues trying to register product.  Can't imagine what would happen if I had to file a claim. Returned our phones to Verizon. Purchased new phones, applied screen savers purchased online which we were able to apply easily. Have dropped phone many times and have had no problems Also purchased cell helmut wireless charger, also a failure.

Review.Titre: Purchased a liquid screen protector for iPhone 11
Review.Contenu: Purchased a liquid screen protector for a perfectly good iphone from cellhelmet. The app to register the product did not complete the registration. Within 48 hours the screen was cracked beyond repair. With pictures to prove the phone was in excellent condition when the product was applied, and the store manager vouching for the truth of that, cellhelmet still refused to honor their warranty. I would not recommend this company to anyone.THE APP DID NOT WORK TO REGISTER THE PRODUCT SO THE COMPANY REFUSES TO HONOR THE WARRANTY. MY REVIEW STANDS.

Review.Titre: After downloading registration
Review.Contenu: After downloading registration app to receive warranty coverage I was asked to make a choice between cell helmet managing my phone calls to allow or not allow. When I chose not allow the application stopped and I was not able to finish registering for warranty coverage. Please help

Review.Titre: On my second cellhelmet screen…
Review.Contenu: On my second cellhelmet screen protector product. First one a week after install it cracked. Phone wasn't dropped spend good money to buy the first one. The had to pay more to get a replacement. Now that one cracked also phone wasn't dropped or abused. The product is not what it is represented to be. Very displeased and will not purchase again

Review.Titre: By using their liquid screen protector
Review.Contenu: By using their liquid screen protector, My phone screen got shiny spot scratches. They charged more than 50$, but not worth it than tempered glass. I recommend use tempered glass to protect screen than regret later.

Review.Titre: Deceptive business practices - don't fall for it.
Review.Contenu: When you're sitting in the repair shop, this looks like a great product.  Lifetime warranty!  AFTER they take your money, you learn that you have to register your phone with the company and even then you don't see the fine print that you have to register by putting their app on your phone!  Absurd, I'm not putting your app on my phone.  Then on top of that, you subsequently learn that the lifetime warranty is only for 1 year.  Absolute waste of time and money.Edit:  My response to your response is that your business practice is deceptive because you don't disclose in advance what's required to take advantage of the warranty.  It should be clearly stated in the advertising, not hidden in the fine print you get AFTER you pay your money and they paint your screen with the chemical.

Review.Titre: Not worth it
Review.Contenu: Not worth it. Screen cracked on two separate phones with this. AND  the “lifetime, money back guarantee?”  Not so much. My claim was denied for “excessive damage to device screen.” $10 tempered glass screen protectors from amazon (or wherever) are the way to go. They actually protect the screen and cheaper. I bought the cellhelmet liquid glass and had a verizon representative apply it to my iPhone screen a while back because of the lifetime warranty and it’s so-called “shatterproof”-ness.  The screen still managed to crack from a short drop, but since I had not registered it, no warranty (I had my screen replaced).  When I bought a new phone recently, I was hesitant to buy it beciase of the poor results, but the Verizon person convinced me it was the best, so I got it and registered it. And my screen cracked again. This time, I filed a claim. It was denied due to “excessive damage to device screen.”

Review.Titre: Warranty Not Honored
Review.Contenu: If zero stars were an option that what my rating would be for both product performance and customer service.  I bought the $300 liquid glass warranty product, which was applied on site before I left the store.  2 months later I dropped my phone, and it broke.  I returned to the store receipt in hand and was told I must contact cell helmet directly.  Upon calling cell helmet they would not honor the warranty, because the application was never registered. They said it was my responsibility not the stores.  Now I seem to be stuck between the store and cell helmet with both implying I am at fault.  No way to prove otherwise, so I am out of luck.....Don't waste your money...

Review.Titre: Having not registered in a 30 day "may"…
Review.Contenu: Having not registered in a 30 day "may" voids the warranty. I contacted customer support having receipts of my phone fixed then applied cellhelmet after on my new screen in the different time of receipts show bc I got it after thought. Having a year to claim this warranty shouldn't leave issue if I have proof of purchase. Also may is discretional meaning up to the person who's in charge which is very vague. Also told me I have to take pictures before and after of my phone screen before registering and this is from the manager who doesn't wanna transfer me to talk to the higher ups. Aron the rep was no help either the manager was not wanting to help or do anything besides dodge my statements with the screen statement saying he will send the terms to me but won't highlight where it states that. One big scam the product and business is.

Review.Titre: Complete rip off
Review.Contenu: Complete rip off!  I bought the case and liquid glass treatment for my Samsung S22 Ultra.  Screen cracked after a few months, and it wasn't even a hard/high fall.  It was on a hardwood floor.  If you have to file a claim you have to deal with their 3rd party insurance company who is outside the US and has odd hours.  They will find every excuse under the sun to reject your claim.Updated: This is how bad the customer service is at Cell Helmet.  They replied to my post here to let me know my dispute of the rejected claim was rejected instead of letting me know through the original service ticket.  Didn't know until 5 days later that they even replied to this.   Complete joke of a company, and I did submit a request before getting a repair, it just took 3 days to hear back from them.  What a joke!!!

Review.Titre: Phone cover quality and replacement
Review.Contenu: I bought a cellhelmet "Fortitude" iPhone cover at Batteries Plus for $39.99 on 12/15/22. My dissatisfaction is both with the product quality and the handling of the replacement. It was installed by the salesperson. About one week later I discovered the case was cracked (no misuse or "impacts"). I went back to Batteries Plus and was told cellhelmet fully guarantees their product and to go to their website for a replacement. I did so and was informed by email the replacement would be sent upon receipt of my payment of $10.98. Of that amount $9.99 is a "processing fee" and $.99 is "shipping guarantee".So my $39.99 "fully guaranteed" case will now cost $50.97. When I emailed cellhelmet about the fees, the reply was "that has always been stated on our website".To me, having to pay what amounts to a 27% surcharge to get a "fully guaranteed" defective product replaced this just seems like a poor way to do business. I certainly won't be buying any more of their stuff or recommending their products to others.

Review.Titre: LICENSE TO STEAL
Review.Contenu: PURCHASED TWICE. SCREWED TWICE. (Insert middle finger) My first purchase of the product was at a repair store; I purposely paid extra for the "Screen Repair Guarantee" and to have it professionally applied. I was not told that I needed to register my purchase. When I went to make a claim a few months later (because the product does not hold up as advertised)  I was denied because I did not do their mystery registration; ALL OF MY RECEIPTS FROM THE PROFESSIONAL STORE AND APPLICATION DID NOT MATTER. So okay I played their stupid game and bought another kit with $300 coverage they gave me a discount on (NOT WORTH IT). When I received the kit and tried to register it said my device was ineligible after several attempts I conceded. A couple weeks later my screen was cracked and I needed to purchase a new device. I received the new device excited I can actually apply the hardener and get the coverage I PAID FOR (twice over now). NOPE DENIED! My PIN was no longer valid. Who runs this company, Charles Ponzi!? Their reply below further shows they care not, just trying to pass blame and they are just greedy.

Review.Titre: Horrible Customer Service.
Review.Contenu: Horrible customer service. I bought their liquid screen protector from Cricket, for $54+ (including tax). While selling, the guy said it has life time warranty and replacement. Within a month my phone screen got a dent. But when i went to the store, they said they know nothing about any warranty! I contacted through email to cellhelmet customer care. They said just sorry for that and said that they are not able to police employees which are not theirs. My question is then why you are selling your items without any authentic dealer, and with such huge price!!!!!!Reply to the customer service: What i purchased, costs me $54(including tax). If it doesn't under your warranty, you should accuse the seller and the store which is selling your products by telling lies to the customers. I have already mailed your customer service with the picture of the receipt, which clearly shows the name of the store and sales person. If customer satisfaction and trust really matters to you, you should take action. Its your reputation which is harmed by the lie of those stores.

Review.Titre: UPS screwed up delivery
Review.Contenu: UPS screwed up the delivery of this product. I have still not received it. But it will probably be delivered by the time I get another new mobile phone in the next 2 to 3 years.FYI UPS left me a note, at the front door, saying it could not drop off my order because nobody was there to sign for it. The note said the Postal Service would make the delivery in about 5 days. The product never reached me.

Review.Titre: BUYER BEWARE - SCAM/DECEPTIVE PRACTICE
Review.Contenu: Purchased liquid glass for my phone with the confidence it would be protected. Well, I could not be more wrong. The company cellhelmet aka Kane and McHenry Enterprises, LLC put in very fine print on the box nowhere else, not even in their ads or recordings that the warranty is only for one (1) year and I had a year a few days ago. Conveniently for this deceptive company they would not inform you when you purchase it or when you register it or call in, the recording goes over everything except that fact. They send you a registration confirmation with all the information except that very important detail so they would not have to honor the warranty or cover the claim. If you don't register it right away, they deny your claim. Too many shady, deceptive practices by this company. If their policy has always been a yewr then why not make it clear. What's the point if it is good a year and it's disguise in fine print that consumers are not aware? If they had any decency they would have put it on the receipt so consumers would be aware but as they have proven, they are not to be trusted and their sole goal is to not cover claims or honor warranty. BUYER BEWARE.

Review.Titre: Waste of time and money
Review.Contenu: Phone broke first time I dropped it with cellhellmet on. Filed a refund and waited 2 weeks for my check. After weeks went by I asked where my check was and they said they forgot to mail it out and would do so next week. ARE YOU KIDDING ME?! 4 weeks after my claim and still waiting even for a confirmation that it was sent. Will never use cellhellmet again, big mistake

Review.Titre: Sloppy Service
Review.Contenu: I paid $9.99 to buy the warranty for a PowerBank, that I used to charge my android phone, that broke. Cellhelmet shipped me a cheap powerbank that couldn't have cost more than $9.99 to make. The replacement is for an iPhone.

Review.Titre: Poor product performance high cost of free replacement

With a few days it was already coming off my phone. Product not preforming up to my expectations. And cost of replacement ie free ie. 10$

Review.Titre: Just lost a customer
Review.Contenu: I travel a lot for work, and while I was traveling I purchased the cellhelmet glass protector for my new phone.  I subsequently lost the receipt but had all the other info.  I could not register for warranty.  I found my receipt 3 days after the initial 30 days and asked to please let me register my product - nope.  It is pretty lame for something that it touted to be a lifetime product to not honor the warranty just 3 days after the 30 days is over.  Better customer service or understanding is needed for real life situations. Will not be purchasing any other products from this company.  Thanks!

Review.Titre: Poor product. Poor customer service.

That took several days.Still have the receipt. Their person installed it.It was registered.If there is a paperwork issue on their end they are not going to cover it.

Asked for a review considering these circumstances, denied.  Don't get fooled, stay away from this company!

Beware of this before purchasing. Would not do it again.

Review.Titre: Paid for the $300 coverage to cover my …
Review.Contenu: Paid for the $300 coverage to cover my   Screen  repair I went out And called for hours and finally spoke with someone after hours and hours trying to get them to answer the phone they told me I need  to have my phone screen replaced 1st then they would Remembers me meWhen and had my screen repaired then they said my warranty was not valid due to a technical glitchWorse company ever will never use this company again for anything!

Review.Contenu: I've a bad experience with cellhelmet. I purchased a liquid protection for my phone but when my screen crashed I file a claim and I was denied as a result of wrong pictures upload. The pictures was not rejected when i registered my phone .

Review.Contenu: Claim denied. They have a program to line your phone up to a mirror to make sure you are not registering a cracked phone. What they are really doing is getting records of the most ridiculous possible pics they can use to later deny your claim. The picture I took was perfect, and you at cellhelmet well know it!

Review.Titre: Fake Warranty
Review.Contenu: I purchased this product through a cell phone screen replacement store.  They replaced a broken screen and applied the liquid glass to the new screen.  Six weeks later, I drop my phone and the screen breaks and the lifetime warranty won't cover the damage.  I did not know that I had to register the warranty, I never opened the box, the store did.  I clearly had it applied to a new screen, I have receipts to prove it, Aron in customer service says they won't cover it.

Review.Titre: Make sure you damage your item within one year
Review.Contenu: As long as you damage your product after having it applied within one year. You are covered but they will not let you know that you need to purchase the product again to keep your item protected. My screen cracked after 2 months but I decided to not make a warranty claim due to it was a minor crack. Now that I want to use the warranty, they tell me I need to repurchase the product to use the claim after one year. I thought this would protect my device. But this is why I don't trust warranty products. They always find a way to screw you over.

Review.Titre: Not worth the effort
Review.Contenu: Expensive and registering the warranty is a lengthy and inconvenient process. No thanks to another useless app on my phone. Definitely one of those 'let's make this as difficult as possible, so we can decline the maximum number of claims' type of things.

Review.Titre: This product took so long to claim
Review.Contenu: This product took so long to claim, I missed my window for activating the new Cell Helmet glass, AND the edge of the replacement Cell Helmet screen protector Spider-Webbed just a week after the registration window living inside of an Otterbox 24/7. $80 down the drain.

Review.Titre: I purchased a $24.99 Cellhelmet charger…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a $24.99 Cellhelmet charger cord on the advice of a clerk at the mobile store. Never again. Cord stopped working within 4 months. I could have gotten a better cord for a third of the price.

Review.Titre: I would give it a 0 if i could
Review.Contenu: I would give it a 0 if i could. Worst customer service ever. Will not be recommending that is for sure. You pay 60.00 and download the app on the phone it is used on. Phone gets a crack, have it repaired and they say its not registered to the phone the app is on, but it is registered and the app is useless. Can't even put a claim in threw the app. And have emailed mutilpe times and one email they say it's not registered then another they describe the phone and number. Then tell them yes thats it and i need to make a claim. Come back and say again wrong number, app is not on the right phone but it is. And the app will not let us re-register another liquid glass, which had we known we would not have wasted our money.

Review.Titre: Abysmal customer service
Review.Contenu: The product seems fine so far, but the company has the worst customer service ever! I can't register my product because their google search shows that I have an iPhone 12, but I actually have an 11. I sent them a screen shot proving it, but they still believe google over reality. They have been rude and unwillingly to help me register my product. If I need to activate my warranty it will be no good because the product and the registration won't match. They drove this customer away!

Review.Titre: I made a mistake on a return and a tep…
Review.Contenu: I made a mistake on a return and a tep sent a new link and said I could return the items and pick again, super cool. But, I really need to talk to someone. This is expensive with the $10 per item fee. I understand that cost. I just don't want to make another mistake and I can't get anyone to call me.

Review.Titre: DON'T BUY
Review.Contenu: Decided to purchase the liquid glass protector for my new phone even though it was quite expensive. What a mistake! I have been waiting for weeks for someone to help me with the technical issue to help with my registration and NO ONE helped me! Now in the process of waiting for help and contacting them constantly a have a minor little nick in the liquid glass and now they won't even help me complete my registration nor fix it or anything!!! Are you kidding me? What kind of customer service is this! DO NOT BUY!!

Review.Titre: Installed by pro tech
Review.Contenu: Installed by pro tech, first good drop screen shattered. Cellhelmet accidentally deleted from my phone. No app, no record, NO coverage. Read warranty carefully, they leave themselves many outs

Review.Titre: Cellhelmet is a rip-off don't use them
Review.Contenu: I tried to submit a claim but they told me my contract was only good for one year and I was never told that when I purchased the policy they are a complete rip-off. And as you can see from their lame reply, how was I supposed to know before I bought it if the salesman never told me it was only good for a year

Review.Titre: Not so great Replacement
Review.Contenu: There was no reason for UPS to not deliver my package to my parents home where it was being sent. Instead now you cancelled my order. I think your company is not so great if they cant keep their word for lifetime replacements and they charge you to replace something that was broken.

Review.Titre: Poor customer service with regards to…
Review.Contenu: Poor customer service with regards to the warranty. I registered my product.  Kept my card, box and receipt. They are telling me they emailed me a PIN and that I did not respond with 30 days..so no warranty.  When you buy this product, you are buying a warranty for repair.  Never again.

Review.Titre: Wireless charger doesn't work half the…
Review.Contenu: Wireless charger doesn't work half the time and also bought a mount that works with a magnet that you can't use with a wireless charger and the company told me to pay shipping to return it. Funny if I bought it from Amazon I could just go drop it off at ups. Lesson learned use Amazon.

Review.Titre: Your company really is garbage
Review.Contenu: Your company really is garbage. Full of cheaters and liars. You don't honor your guarantees at all. I tried to make a claim to get my screen paid for and all I got was excuses as to why you won't honor your guarantee. You're all fake! I have referred so many of my customers to you and your products thinking that it really was a great company to work with, but now I know that I have let don't those customers. I have received my one and only warning sign. I will never buy your stuff again and I will never sell your products again.

Review.Titre: Had cellhelmet put on by retailer
Review.Contenu: Had cellhelmet put on by retailer, who also registered my phone with them. Months later my phone screen cracked. They refused to pay the claim because the screen shot that retailer took was of the ceiling.  Don't bother making a claim. They don't live up to thier warranty.

Review.Titre: Cellhelmut is a waste. Product didn't work
Review.Contenu: I am a disabled veteran with a  tbi. I tend to drop things alot. I dropped my phone on my living room floor Christmas Day and it cracked after a month. I didn't know I had to register within 30days (purchased 17Nov with an initial repair) had it repaired again 26Dec. Cellhelmut said sorry, can't do anything but offer a discount on another purchase.  I refuse to ever buy this product again, it didn't work the first time.  In the past I've used Zaggs Invisible Shield and never had an issue or used a claim.

Review.Titre: Purchased product from dealer and phone…
Review.Contenu: Purchased product from dealer and phone screen Cracked 6 months laterSuppose to recieve 300 for repair but they said they wouldn't because verification picture in app wasn't as clear as they wanted, asked dealer about this and showed him information that ashley sent in email and he said that's bull ans is not carrying them anymore.  Replying to your reply picture was clear and the owner of the store even said that within 5 seconds while looking at the picture.  Your response is to save face Goodluck screwing over others

Review.Titre: This company is a Joke
Review.Contenu: This company is a Joke, I advise you not to buy this product. My call phone was repaired one day after the warranty expired. NYS has been hit hard by the Covid and repairing my phone was not on the top of my priority list. Firstly, the denied the claim because of the time line. Secondly, they denied saying the picture sent was not adequate. So in essence they knew all along that after paying for this product they had no intention of honoring the warranty. Stay away !! Tell your Verizon store to rid themselves of this rip off..

Review.Titre: shipped totally different case then what I ordered
Review.Contenu: Ordered 13 Pro case-got a random 6.7 case that says 2021 on it so now cant even use it. Emailed the company and still haven't heard back.

Review.Titre: Love the case hate the tempered glass
Review.Contenu: Love the case.  The tempered glass for the camera on the other hand sucks.  Put it on and fell off in less then 24 hrs. Would not recommend it at all.  Paid 20 for something that will probaly not even stay on.

Review.Titre: Product didn’t work on first drop
Review.Contenu: Product didn’t work on first drop, less than 3 weeks from purchase. Claim was denied because picture wasn’t “clear” enough when I registered product, which appears to be just a way for them to flippantly deny claims. Stay away!

Review.Titre: Do not buy this product they make the…
Review.Contenu: Do not buy this product they make the registration not user friendly, only not to have to pay out claims. Please save your money they only care about getting your money not the satisfaction of their customers. This is one of the worst things I have ever bought. its not a streamline process and their communications/customer service is as bad as the claim being paid. I hate when companies abuse people like this and take advantage. People work hard for their money its not right to scheme people out of it. Find ways to help people instead of trying to get over and make a couple bucks

Review.Titre: Not worth the money- warranty is B.S.
Review.Contenu: I purchased a cord for 24.99 and it stopped working. I was able to get another under warranty for 9.99. Within a few months it stopped working so I contacted to company get another but I didnt want to pay 9.99. At this point the cord would now cost 44.99. They gave me 5.00 off and I received the wrong cord and had to order another one and it didn’t accept the discount so I paid another 9.99. I contacted the company and they wouldn’t credit my card the difference. SoFor 1 cord the total cost 49.99. TheWarranty is just words. You can buy a cord anywhere for 9.99 and replace it every 3 or 4 months.

Review.Titre: I’ve purchased the liquid glass and my…
Review.Contenu: I’ve purchased the liquid glass and my phone still broke! I’ve had to pay out of pocket for the repairs and have had no luck getting in contact with representatives. I’ve called, filed a claim, emailed and attempted live support. EXTREMELY Unsatisfied!!!

Review.Titre: Cellhelmet is a complete joke
Review.Contenu: This company is a complete joke.  Submitted a claim and in error took a photo of myself than in the mirror.  They would not allow me to resubmit the claim. THEY ARE NOT HUMAN. THEY MAKE NO MISTAKES. As a customer that received no customer support. I went off. Instead of helping the situation they called my boss and threatened her with liable actions.  To put her company in social media, and more threats.   A letter was sent and they basically denied the claim WITHOUT a legit reason.  Because they can. BBB is next. As well as the Pennsylvania consumer Department of Agriculture. Stay far away.

Review.Titre: This is the worst company I have ever…
Review.Contenu: This is the worst company I have ever dealt with. The do not respond to claims, keep sending me to different numbers and email addresses. Trying to speak with someone that has knowledge of how to complete a claim is impossible. Do not use this company.

Review.Titre: obviously doesnt work
Review.Contenu: obviously doesnt work when my phone fell from my pocket and shattered on the parking lot asphalt. that was barely 3 feet. and then of course, the company fails to honor their $300 repair guarantee. uselss junk and liars/theives that sell it

Review.Titre: SCREEN SCRATCHED.The warranty expires in 30 days.
Review.Contenu: The warranty expires in 30 days. There is not contact information in their site either. NO CUSTOMER SERVICE AT ALL. To use the warranty you must register the product.I bought the liquid glass screen protector but I kept using the 3 in one case (it has screen protector). After a month (warranty is expired) I dropped the phone and the screen protector broke. I did not buy another one (too sad). Only a week after the phone screen got scratched some  lights and a couple deep. Money to the garbage and the screen with scratches. Fortunately the screen is not broken. The liquid glass protector is totally USELESS.

Review.Titre: Cell Helmet is a terrible company
Review.Contenu: Cell Helmet is a terrible company. Read the REAL reviews, not the ones they pay for. They do anything not to pay a claim. Go to BBB and see all the complaints. UBreakifix should be ashamed of themselves for selling this useless product.

Review.Titre: Insurance is not guaranteed
Review.Contenu: I only paid for the liquid screen protector because of the guaranteed insurance. The insurance is not guaranteed after 30 days but that’s only listed inside the box, if I knew that I would have actually registered on time. Waste of money and time.

Review.Titre: I had a phone repaired got the cell…
Review.Contenu: I had a phone repaired got the cell helmet and the warranty. On the warranty it said I had 30 days to set it up. We were also told that we couldn’t set it up within the first 24 hours actually the place told us two days so we waited. They apparently needed the time to have the soul helmet set. Within two weeks well within the 30 day period that they allowed us my daughter dropped her phone and it broke. I paid for the insurance and I was in the 30 day window they denied the insurance. This company is not only not on the Better Business Bureau it doesn’t back its work by saying yes we will honor it it also thinks that every client is lying to them.

Review.Titre: I will never buy their Products again!!!
Review.Contenu: I purchased the screen protector when I broke my phone and the registration process failed for some reason. The screen broke a second time so I had to pay for it myself at which time I bought another screen protector and register it successfully when I got home. A few months later the screen broke again using their protector so I filed a claim. They denied my claim stating that I registered the screen protector the same day it was purchased and I should have waited 24  hours to register it. I am out $140 for their products and almost $600 in repairs. I will NEVER buy NOR recommend their products ever again. They refuse to make this right.

Review.Titre: I was robbed by Cellhelmet of my $300…
Review.Contenu: I was robbed by Cellhelmet of my $300 liquid screen protector coverage.  I registered online, jumped through all the hoops.  24 hour countdown timer started with app. Downloaded to phone.  Have original receipts, pin numbers.Apparently there is another layer of information you must register within 30 days.  Cellhelmet says they have no records of my information.    Now, 8 months later I have cracked screen on my Samsung Note 9.  Very disappointed with $50 Cellhelmet Liquid Screen protector.      Good news is the Vendor that sold me on Cellhelmet Liquid screen protector is willing to give me $50 credit towards  screen replacement. Still will cost me close to $200 out of pocket.

Review.Titre: Dishonest an scammers
Review.Contenu: SCAMMERSDo not use them more than once ever!I purchased their item for a second time in a different state and the pin code on the card was the same AS A PIN CODE THAT I USE IN GA compared to Florida.  They accused me of making a mistake and used the old pin twice.  I told them I never kept the old pin card I threw it away once I registered. Why would I use an old card I used the card that I purchased and registered that day. I spent $60 on it. Do you guys know the odds of getting the same pin twice mixing 10 digits and letters together is like in the millions. They do this on purpose so they can deny your claim. Honestly felt so betrayed and hurt because I trusted them. Don't use them believe me.

Review.Titre: I was sent the wrong screen protectors…
Review.Contenu: I was sent the wrong screen protectors I need iPhone 11 I was sent iPhone 7/8 I sent an email to get the correct ones sent and still haven’t heard back

Review.Titre: ON HOLD FOR 30 MINS!!
Review.Contenu: I was on hold for almost 30 minutes and I finally gave up. I decided to call another time. If the same occurs a second time, I will CANCEL my account altogether!!

Review.Titre: Uhhh there’s other companies and products that do better
Review.Contenu: Warranty was not easy to use.  The store I purchased it at threw away the original info I needed when they installed the cover.  Contacted your help desk- they were pleasant- but a code they provided, still didn’t work due to the new iPhone 14 pro  did not have a warranty option (per your rep) The cover only lasted 8 s days before there was a scratch that caused distorted photos.

Review.Titre: the screen seems to crack very easily
Review.Contenu: the screen seems to crack very easily:  this is my first time with this product and it does not seem to be durable at all.  Also disappointed that I have to pay 9.99 for the replacement when it is free lifetime warranty. This was not the case with my last product

Review.Titre: Broke jus as fast as any other !
Review.Contenu: Broke jus as fast as any other !! And was more cost for it so do the math

Review.Titre: This is the 3rd one on this phone
Review.Contenu: This is the 3rd one on this phone. I bought the phone in August It makes me laugh when it said military tested. My guess is you had the Air Force test it. It sure doesn't live up to a U.S. Marine lifestyle.

Review.Titre: Very hard to use hard to register and…
Review.Contenu: Very hard to use hard to register and never sending responses

Review.Titre: I got into the website to order a new…
Review.Contenu: I got into the website to order a new charger that was under warranty.  I felt the site was difficult to find the warranty section and called the number listed.  They referred me to a website that was the exact same thing and I felt I was going in circles.  I found another number to call and they gave me an email address, who gave me different directions to find the warranty section.  I ordered a new charger and was sent the wrong one.  I finally just gave up.

Review.Titre: The process to return the item was very…complicated, expensive, and time consuming
Review.Contenu: The process to return the item was very complex, I also had to buy another one without the discount I had on the original offer, I just wanted a replacement and instead had to pay to return to the product and spent more for the same item. I love the product but the response time/ customer service is not very good.

Review.Titre: The phone glass screen cracked within a month
Review.Contenu: The phone glass screen cracked within a months time, from dropping my phone, (but I never had a problem with my phone cracking with the original screen )that was July 27, 2021. As of today, 9/22/21, I am just being reimburse although my receipt was downloaded on Aug 9, 2021. Be prepared to wait on your reimbursement check.

Review.Titre: My phone is protected by Cell Helmet…
Review.Contenu: My phone is protected by Cell Helmet and has worked well, until this past weekend. I dropped my phone, and yes...It cracked. Now I'm in the process of getting the warranty I paid for. I'm waiting to see what will come of my cracked screen. Im being honest- Its not looking good. I cant simply call customer service; Its only available online. This is not a good situation to be in, so I hope the process is simple...I'll keep you all updated.

Review.Titre: Tried to get help with a claim
Review.Contenu: Tried to get help through the chat with a claim. The customer service chat agent couldn’t find my registration. Did not help.I called cell helmet and they were able to find my registration that the chat agent couldn’t find. So, I’m editing my review to show why I gave two stars to chat assistance agent who failed to find that I indeed had registered my cellhelmet.

Review.Titre: I waisted $60
Review.Contenu: If you believe in the value of your product, you should send a free second application of your product via mail. To only reimburse the cost of the repair without reimbursing the cost of the cell helmet liquid itself is an oversight. Since I realize that I waisted $60 on the purchase of the original cell helmet application, I will no longer purchase anymore products from you. Thank you for your time. Adam Lowrey

Review.Titre: Registering the product feels shady
Review.Contenu: The steps you need to go through to register this product just to insure you can make a claim if the need arises is RIDICULOUS ! The process really gives the impression that they are trying to do everything they can to make sure loopholes exists should a claim be denied. I haven't had to make a claim but I will never buy another product from this company. Just feels really shady.

Review.Titre: i broke the lifetime warranty tempered…
Review.Contenu: i broke the lifetime warranty tempered glass on my phone. when i replied to them asking how i get the earranty initiated i was basically blown off, instead being pointed to buying a new init instead. i opted in purchasing their liquid glass after fetting fed up with their round and round that goes no where warranty page. i will not ever buy the tempered glass replacement for a phone from thos company ever again. its not woryh it.

Review.Titre: it works well but the fine print will…
Review.Contenu: it works well but the fine print will get you it should be made very clear the warranty is only for one year with the cost of it. I will not buy it again for the money ill go with another product i let them up sale me to the 300 dollar one so now im out 240 bucks to fix my phone and the cost of the useless screen protector only reason i bought it was for the  warranty.So in all decent product not worth the cost unless you break your screen frequently.

Review.Titre: Jolan was somewhat helpful
Review.Contenu: Jolan was somewhat helpful. They did answer two of my questions, what an IMEI was, and why I couldnt send them a picture through the IM. My plan was to send a picture of my device to them so they can confirm that's what was needed. When i asked if there was a data cap in the IM window they did not answer and reiterated that the photo has to be send to the customer service email. This was insulting as i was just trying confirm I took the correct picture.

Review.Titre: Poor fit on warranty replacement
Review.Contenu: Everything was great with the initial product. However, I just requested a warranty replacement for the screen protector because it cracked (thereby doing its job and saving the screen). The replacement that arrived is a very poor fit which leaves fairly large gaps around the edges. I sent CellHelmet a message through their website about the problem but have not received a response.

Review.Titre: They were quick to ship a replacement
Review.Contenu: They were quick to ship a replacement.   Unfortunately, the new screen protector looks horrible and never properly adhered to the screen, so half of the screen has a bubble on it.  We even took it to the cell phone retailer to make sure it was installed properly.   I will not buy this product again.

Review.Titre: Not Sticking!
Review.Contenu: I cleaned my cell phone case very well and waited until I knew it was dry. The magnet did not stick well and came off after only one day of use. Also, the tape for the base was not very effective and I had to use another piece, that was provided with my order, to get it to stick to my dash. Overall not very satisfied for the price. I have not had a chance to contact the company about this yet however. Hope they will make it right.

Review.Titre: this product did not last more than 2…
Review.Contenu: this product did not last more than 2 months and i got scratchs on the glass deep scratchs ......then you must come out of pocket for repairs and the time consuming process of that then your money is held during the claim process and finally re-imbursed.......my opinion is if they say this product can support glass damage and come to find out i didnt ......we the customer shouldnt have to come out of pocket for the repair

Review.Titre: When I purchased this item
Review.Contenu: When I purchased this item, was told item was life time replacement. When I went to replace it, was told item not in stock, could only replace it though manufacturer for a fee, $10.00 sounds like a bait and switch, not happy.

Review.Titre: Registration app had a shutter delay in…
Review.Contenu: Registration app had a shutter delay in the required picture step which would only take a picture of a white screen. I can only imagine that if I ever have to file a claim this will be a reason for them to decline my claim. Support is non-existent.

Review.Titre: Found out that my screen replacement…
Review.Contenu: Found out that my screen replacement could not be done due an issue with 3rd party screen repair compatibility and the repair could only be done by Apple. I was not notified prior to the purchasing of the product and the voucher for screen repair did not apply to any repairs done by Apple. Was told that I have to wait for Apple to patch the issue with 3rd party screen repairs upon contacting one of the 3rd party screen repair services

Review.Titre: Liquid glass and scratch remover
Review.Contenu: I followed all the instructions to a T. I also watched the videos to make sure I was doing it all correctly and I saw zero results on the scratches to my screen. I also did the same thing for the liquid glass screen saver and I’m not sure there is anything at all on my phone as a protective layer. Over all the small scratches I did have honestly are now slightly more visible are buffing them and I have no idea if the screen saver is there or not. These have not been my favorite products sorry to say. 😕

Review.Titre: Smoke and mirrors
Review.Contenu: Smoke and mirrors. I was conned into buying the gold plus liquid at my local Sprint store when I picked up my note nine. After a drop from my nightstand (in a case as well) the screen not only cracked, and CellHelmate is clearly not interested in honoring the $300 guarantee. Never falling for this $60 cash grab again.

Review.Titre: I should not have had to pay anything…
Review.Contenu: I should not have had to pay anything for a replacement for lifetime guaranteed product...charge 9.00 on a product that is lifetime guarantee is bogus...the original cord only cost 23.00 you should absorb the cost of shipping since your product did not live up to its gaurantee.

Review.Titre: Not the savior you are looking for
Review.Contenu: Well it did get rid of some scratches I think, but the majority of them stayed. I don't know if I did something wrong, but I ended up being disappointed in the product I did exactly how it read and the results were okay.I have contacted customer support but to no avail have gotten a response. 8/03/19

Review.Titre: Good product... poor customer service.
Review.Contenu: Great product, however, buyer beware!!!!! After you purchase this product You NEED to fill out a form and download their app. I've had the product on my phone for a year and they WILL NOT cover their promised screen coverage, even though I purchased the Liquid Glass PRO+ Screen Protector - Phone/Watch - $69.99 - no card doesn't matter what level you buy they DO NOT cover you. Unfortunately, I will never use this product again as they don't really mean their coverage. So sad customer service is poor at best.

Review.Titre: I bought my cable from a Verizon store…
Review.Contenu: I bought my cable from a Verizon store and 3 days later it quit charging my phone. I took it back they said I had to go online and get a replacement. I did that and was charged 9.99! I only had the 1st one for 3 days and ps over $30 for it and then had to pay another $10 for a replacement? Sounds like a scam. NOT HAPPY

Review.Titre: The glass protector is useless in…
Review.Contenu: The glass protector is useless in protecting your glass. We've had 4 screens replaced already. Only good side is it's like an insurance plan that does cover getting the screen replaced. It's good for that but this time around I'll be getting a 2nd screen protector for back up.

Review.Titre: My 20 watt plug and cord only lasted 4…
Review.Contenu: My 20 watt plug and cord only lasted 4 months. Then I had to pay 21 dollars for a handling fee even though it's a lifetime warranty. I'll buy another brand next time.

Review.Titre: Your registration process is cumbersome…
Review.Contenu: Your registration process is cumbersome and inefficient.  During the registration process I tried multiple times to put in my ten digit serial number to no avail.  Out of frustration, I’ve chosen to not try again.

Review.Titre: It said it can last long 4 months later…
Review.Contenu: It said it can last long 4 months later and I have to play with the cord to get it to charge.. at that point I'm like yes there is warranty. But it cost 10 dollars. Really I should have just bought a better one. Only good thing is that it's a really long charger

Review.Titre: Cellhelmet has crappy product and customer service.
Review.Contenu: I cracked my screen the end of March I called in a claim it was like an act of congress to get a claim number a week later it broke again I called to claims and now you have to pay for the repairs out of your pocket and then file a claim and it can take between 2 to 6 weeks to get your money back. I will never put Cellhelmet on any of my phones again it is crap it don't hold up for crap. They make you feel like you are trying to screw them when you have to show that you purchased there product.I did register my Cellhelmet but you guys make it hard to do a claim.

Review.Titre: I got a new iPhone XR
Review.Contenu: I got a new iPhone XR. The coating cracked - causing me to get the iPhone screen replaced. Corner cracked - so not sure if it was the person applying the CellHelmet. Question for those that have received their warranty check - which company issues the check?

Review.Titre: replacement
Review.Contenu: customer service was ok ,I really did not expect such an expensive product to crack after only 3 months of use and no know droppage .To have to pay to have a new one shipped to me with a lifetime warranty I though was  very poor business practice

Review.Titre: False Advertisement
Review.Contenu: I had to pay $9.99 for "processing" for a glass screen protector for my phone that has a lifetime warranty on it.  I had to pay a 1/4 of the original price of the item to receive a replacement.  This appears to be false advertising. When I tried to get an explanation for the fee, I called numerous listed numbers and they all redirected me back to the website to file a claim and the only way to file a claim was by paying the processing fee. It was very frustrating and felt like the system was created to force me to pay the fee. I will not be purchasing other items from cellhelmet in the future.

Review.Titre: I followed the instructions, but...
Review.Contenu: After I followed the instructions it removed the scratches but added some in it's place, so I'm back to square one. The scratches are the tiniest they can possibly be but I bought your product because I can be OCD about having a scratch free screen.

Review.Titre: The 1st one I  got for my s8 Galaxy…
Review.Contenu: The 1st one I  got for my s8 Galaxy broke in my pocket. I went through the process and it was replaced for $9. The 2nd one I got did not stay on even though I followed all the recommendations for installing it. It kept coming off, and in addition, I could not swipe down from the top(a problem with both the first and second one)because the top of the cell helmet was not sensitive enough to pull down the settings menu. I ended up not using it at all and it is back in the Box. Just don't think it was designed very well for the S8 Galaxy phone. Wish I could get my money back for it.

Review.Titre: My first QI charger broke with hardly…
Review.Contenu: My first QI charger broke with hardly any use within months, completely refused to charge. Cellhelmet gets 2 stars for shipping me a new charger for free with the warranty replacement program, but ive used this new charger 3 times and its not charging anymore.

Review.Titre: I had my cell helmet installed on my iPhone  12
Review.Contenu: I had my cell helmet installed on my iPhone 12 at Verizon. I was told it was a lifetime warranty. I would have to pay only for the glass  of 9.99.  When it was defective and chipped all around the edges, I went in to my store where I had it installed and was told I had to go online to get a new glass sent to me. I would have never bought it if I had known what a pain it would be to get a new one. I reached out to cell helmet and it was terribly difficult to figure out what to do. Finally during a chat online I was able to get help. I still had to pay the 9.99 even though it was defective. The only positive was the nice guy I talked to in the chat. I feel it’s to difficult to get a new one, the store should have them to replace.

Review.Titre: Bought one 2 mths ago
Review.Contenu: Bought one 2 mths ago. It already started to peel away from facing. Received a new one for free, but, had to pay shipping & handling. I’ll wait to see how this one performs and hopefully give a better review

Review.Titre: 2 cracks within 3 weeks of use

Review.Titre: The screen protecter did protect my…
Review.Contenu: The screen protecter did protect my phone but it didnt even last a week and it had a chip in it.  I had to pay another $10 for a free replacement.  Obviously someone does not understand the concept of free!

Review.Titre: No returns!
Review.Contenu: I bought two charger cables for $45.00 total. They weren’t the right size for my charger base but I couldn’t return them. Never heard of any business not allowing returns especially when they are undamaged, etc.

Review.Titre: DO NOT BUY!
Review.Contenu: The scratch remover did very little to remove the scratch on my screen. The very obvious removal of the oleophobic coating on my screen is much more noticeable. My phone is now in worse condition than before.

Review.Titre: I might come back and change this…
Review.Contenu: I might come back and change this review but at this point I am not a happy camper.  I bought and installed the product and was told I had 30 days to register it so I could get replacment coverage.  When I installed the app, to continue it is asking me to allow the app to "make and manage' calls on my cell.  That bothers me.  When I called customer service I was given a song and dance answer that it just would allow the app to access my phones serial number.  If I wanted I could instead go to the cellhelmet web site and register there.  But I went there and I *can't* register anything there.  So she lied to me.  I am very unhappy with this treatment and would not recommend this product to anyone.

Review.Titre: Frustrating waste of money and time.
Review.Contenu: Purchased this with recommendation from the sales agent. Bought it for two new phones. Went online, registered two phones and on we went. Two months later - one of the phones was dropped and the screen cracked all the way through. Later the screen no longer work. Now it's a nightmare trying to process the claim. One, you cannot talk to a person - it's all over e-mail and two, they're saying my phone was never registered in time. But, the kicker - I called earlier and they didn't show it - but told me to just register and it'd be fine. (since one of the phones on the receipt was in fact registered and showing in that 30 day window).So frustrating and I will not recommend it to anyone.

Review.Titre: Cracked screen
Review.Contenu: I’ve used Speck cases for years, and this is the first time with a Speck case that I’ve ended up with a cracked screen, and with a short drop.   Disappointed in what I thought would be a great product.

Review.Titre: I got my screen replaced on 12/13/19…
Review.Contenu: I got my screen replaced on 12/13/19 and got a screen protector put on and a cell helmet case.  Everything was fine.  I didn't get a chance to register my device until 12/16/19.  On 12/16/19, I had to swerve to avoid someone who cut me off and my bag went across the car.  As a result, my screen protector was cracked. Its one of those screen protectors that has a UV adhesive.  I tried to file a claim, but during the chat, it sounded like whoever I was chatting with did not believe me.  Eventually, he just stopped responding.  I'm not super happy right now.  I know the process is a reimbursement process, and I have no issue with that, but when you're chatting with an agent and not getting anywhere, that's where my problem lies.

Review.Titre: Product- good Claims-very poor
Review.Contenu: I am happy with the product. My child has dropped her phone countless times with no shatter. I have 5 products protected. HOWEVER, when my daughter broke her phone, I called the number and put in a claim. Since I have so many products, it was against the wrong item. Now the claim is denied. I've been trying to speak to a person. Sent chat requests. One day I did get a call, I asked for a call back in 15 min. Like many, I am working from home. No return call. It has been a week. Worse than that, the product code that I did use has now dropped the warranty because it was the wrong device. They can tell that by the picture- it is a watch. Why couldn't you tell me I had the wrong claim number when I called. I hope you don't ever have to make a claim.

Review.Titre: Quick and easy
Review.Contenu: Cellhelmet’s website is easy to use and navigate. I liked the simplicity of it and how everything was laid out. I will be by more products from them. Thanks Cellhelmet!

Review.Titre: At first the product seemed amazing
Review.Contenu: At first the product seemed amazing. The screen looked and felt awesome. About a week after installing I had the phone in my pocket, when I pulled the phone out the screen was cracked and spider webbing.

Review.Titre: Quite the Hassel
Review.Contenu: Almost got denied my claim because even though I had a receipt with the repairs being done before the warranty expired, I didn't email it to the company immediately and therefore was 'out of warranty.' Also, I work a lot and am not available to talk to representatives on the phone. If you file a claim, they will try to tell you to make yourself available all day so that they can assist you.Not worth the money.Edit 6/26/20 to cellhelmets 'rssponse' - So they need my receipts again, even though yesterday the representative I talked to online told me I shouldn't be receiving any calls because my claim was already approved and a refund was supposed to be sent out soon. Apparently the people at this company don't know how to communicate with each other either.

Review.Titre: I paid $ 30.00 the first time for the…
Review.Contenu: I paid $ 30.00 the first time for the product. I simply don’t understand why I still have to pay again to get another one. It doesn’t cost $10 to ship such a small item. I’m not satisfied.

Review.Titre: It was a short contact
Review.Contenu: It was a short contact. I asked about the process of my claim and an update. The person I spoke to did not see any information and told me to call back Friday or Saturday to get an update.

Review.Titre: I have had this screen protector on my…
Review.Contenu: I have had this screen protector on my phone for less than a week and it already has a chip on the edge. That is what happened to the last one as well. I expected more.

Review.Titre: Might be just me
Review.Contenu: Might be just me, I do drop my phone a lot, but this is why I bought it. Both times, it only lasted a week before I broke it. On the bright side, my phone screen isn’t cracked, but...

Review.Titre: Tempered Glass is fine, liquid glass is another story
Review.Contenu: Tempered Glass is fine, they stand behind that product.  They have problems w/ their liquid glass registration process and dont stand behind it if you dont get it registered.

Review.Titre: Great product, Warranty process not so much..
Review.Contenu: The company has a great pitch to lure you in, and for the most part, the product is well designed. The reason for the low score is more to do with the warranty and registration issues. The warranty is handled by an app and third party in the case of the phone case I bought. The app generated a random IMEI number, and if you do not catch the mistake within 48 hours, you are out of luck. Needless to say, it keeps them from having to pay out in the instance you filed a claim and did not catch it.Update: As predicted I am now three weeks into disputes on the validity of my claim and guess what the issue is; the IMEI. They have stated the 48-hour policy and claimed the app gets the information from the phone so there is no reason for it to be wrong, however, they admit it could make a mistake and that's why they have 48 hours for correction. I will update again once a resolution is made.

Review.Titre: From the pictures I thought it was…
Review.Contenu: From the pictures I thought it was textured grips. It was just a piece of smooth plastic. The pics are very deceiving.

Review.Titre: Bought a wireless charger a little over…
Review.Contenu: Bought a wireless charger a little over a year ago. The charger is extremely inconsistent, and that would be an under statement. The charger works maybe 30% of the time, the other 70% of the time it shows that it's charging but doesn't. Of course the only time I notice the problem is when I am severely low on battery (luckily my other chargers, not from cell helmet, work well enough to keep my phone decently charged) I attempted to return/replace it under the manufacturer's warranty. The cost to do so was roughly half the replacement cost. I've finally disposed of the piece of trash and will buy a replacement from another company. With return/replacement policies like that, on a product that works under 50% of the time, I can't see why anyone would choose to buy again. I know I won't.

Review.Titre: Great customer service
Review.Contenu: I want to thank the customer service for taking care of the issue I had with a charger, they corrected my issue and made a happy camper out of me

Review.Titre: WE received the wrong replacement…
Review.Contenu: WE received the wrong replacement cords.  When we finally got the right cords, they quit working within two weeks.  These cost too much money to break so quickly!

Review.Titre: Online order
Review.Contenu: I ordereplaced an order online, I thought I was ordering a charging cord for my phone, turned out it is for an iPhone.  There are no instructions on how to return it.

Review.Titre: They do not send confirmation emails
Review.Contenu: They do not send confirmation emails. I’ve ordered from them twice both times no confirmation emails just tracking a few days later. That’s a bit nerve wrecking!

Review.Titre: Very Disappointed
Review.Contenu: I'm writing this here hoping that more people come forward with similar situations. I followed every one of the requirements to be covered under the warranty. However, since I contacted cellhelmet representatives seeking reimbursement they have only provided excuses (e.g., they are having issues with the server, holidays, etc.) At this moment, it has been over a month since I submitted everything that was requested, including the receipt after completing the repair, and they have failed to inform me the status of this claim or why they are not paying it. They only keep referring to an email that they allegedly sent requesting the receipt that I sent 3 times to them. Please share through this avenue if this is happening to more people or if this is just my case.**UPDATE 12/29/20: After continuous follow up they did pay the claim. This process could have been a lot easier but in the end they honored their commitment.

Review.Titre: While the scuffs look much better
Review.Contenu: While the scuffs look much better, the whole screen feels different now and the deeper marks are more visible when using the device than they were previously

Review.Titre: Hit and many misses
Review.Contenu: This product was easy to register...the first time.  Once I broke the screen, got it repaired and repurchased the cell helmet product, it was challenging to reregister my device.  If you are interested in speaking to a live person, that isn't part of the outsourced warranty department, good luck. I called their "Customer service" line only to find that I there was not a live person to speak with there.  I bet if I was a wholesaler, there would have been someone for me to talk to.  I had to "chat" with someone in which I found it difficult to explain my predicament.  To the credit of the person I chatted with, I was able to finally accomplish my goal.  However, it should be a much more streamlined process for the repeat customers out there.  I hope I don't have any challenges getting my reimbursement check, for if I do, I will be back here to write another review.

Review.Titre: Terrible Claim Experience
Review.Contenu: Terrible Claim ExperienceThe people were nice, but the system and process for trying to place a claim were very difficult.  When you select "file a claim" on the app, it makes you call them. Depending on when or where you bought it, they may tell you to call a different number.I sent an email to the claims department with the requested information, only to get a denial back, with a reference to the wrong purchase and warranty date.  They are telling me it's not covered.  But their app on my phone says I have 57 days left.  So now I'm trying to get it processed by calling them, getting transferred, asked to email again....still getting the run around.  Bottom line, don't bother with Cell Helmet, as they seem to be an evasive insurance company, making it hard to make a claim.  Next time, I'll go with a Zagg liquid glass warranty product, since they are the leader in the industry.

Review.Titre: Can't Say That I'm Surprised, Bummer
Review.Contenu: A couple days after getting my Pixel 4 XL I accidentally slid my phone into the same pocket as my keys and I've been dealing with a couple  scratches/scuffs as a result. I was heartbroken.I bought cellhelmet after doing some research on scratch removers and they had great reviews. The product was cost effective and shipping was decently quick given the current world climate. So far so good.Unfortunately that's where the good news stopped. After receiving the product I followed the directions meticulously as I did not want to make things any worse by using the product incorrectly. I even verified my phone was not on the list of unsupported devices.The three or four scratches on my phone were very minor so I had high hopes that the product would eliminate them all together. To my surprise, after using the buffing compound and wiping all of the excess product off the screen, the scratches and scuffs were still there with what looked to be no change at all.I couldn't in good conscience recommend this product to anyone else.

Review.Titre: I use to LOVE this company when they…
Review.Contenu: I use to LOVE this company when they first started out. Great product, great customer service,  and easy hassle free warranty process. But now....Ugh! They make a little bit of money and they make everything so difficult.  You send the "3rd party" the information needed to file a claim. It'll take almost a week to hear anything back. Customer service is not too bad. Depends on if you can get a rep to even answer you on the chat.The warranty process is such a pain in the rear. Come on Cellhelmet fix this! I have bought a many of accessories from you for my family and myself. I'm talking mother,  sister,  cousin, aunt, uncle, niece, nephew, husband and daughter. This was my go to birthday Christmas presents. I mean liquid glass pro+, the cellhelmet gel case with the $300 warranty, and chargers. Not any more. Now as long as I have to pull teeth to even get my screen fixed. I refuse to buy anything else from you. You advertise hassel free warranty process.  That false advertising. It's a HUGE HASSLE.  Fix it before you lose a lot of customers over careless employees you choose to employ.Thank you,Once was a huge supporter.  Now I'm switching to the basic tempered glass and insurance.  Less BS.

Review.Titre: First off let me start by saying I like…
Review.Contenu: First off let me start by saying I like their product.  I bought my first cellhelmet accessory when I was on a business trip and I stopped by an authorized reseller to buy a charging cable for my phone because I was having problems with the cables I had.  I ended up buying one of their fast chargers with a cable for 3 reasons: 1) I needed a replacement for the fast charger that came with my phone that stopped working, 2) the charging cable worked well with my phone, and 3) the sales rep sold me on the lifetime warranty that came with the product.  After I got home from my trip, I decided to buy an additional charger with a charging cable and 2 additional longer length charging cables.  Everything arrived as expected and everything was good until one of my items stopped working.  At first I thought it was just my phone, but it didn't work with any device and remembering there was a lifetime warranty on the product, I decided to look into it.  So using my cell phone, I went to their site to figure out how the warranty worked and all I could see was a $9.99 processing and handling fee.  I was a little surprised and figured I must be missing something on my small screen so I decided to call them.  The representative I spoke with confirmed the $9.99 fee and when I asked why it was so much she didn't really have a good answer for me.  I personally think this is way too much especially when you consider most of the "As seen on TV" products charge $3.99 for processing.  I could say more but I'll leave it as that.

Review.Titre: Did not work for me...
Review.Contenu: Did not work for me.... Followed the instructions TO A T!!

Review.Titre: The process of filing a claim is…HECTIC
Review.Contenu: The process of filing a claim is absolutely nuts! I was told I couldn't be reimbursed because I filed the claim with the wrong company, which is absolutely crazy because I used the Cell Helmet app to obtain the number to process the claim! Than somehow they filed a claim on my new liquid glass rather than my old. Than someone called me saying we need proof of the original liquid glass purchase. I sent that and called the number in the app again, only to get some company called Fortegra , and was told because it was now after the one-year mark it wouldn't be accepted. I was completely confused on who Fortegra even was and advised of my claim number to be told, "oh that's Cell Helmet's claim number, not ours" (WELL DUH I don't who Fortegra is as I have a Cell Helmet product and app!!). So I asked for a supervisor and was told one wasn't available. Kenya at Fortegra was rude AND unhelpful, and left me at that. So I reached back out to Cell Helmet and explained the matter. I filed the claim within the one year and sent all supporting documents. I was told they would honor the claim as I had the original email with Cell Helmet claim number on it, along with proof of the date that was within the parameters. The very next day I get an email saying we need document of your insurance claim. Mind you at this point I had emailed the original claim & all supporting documents (proof of purchase of the liquid glass, the insurance claim & deductible proof AND the packaging slip for when I received the replacement device) to 4 different emails including both Cell Helmet AND Fortegra. This process has been nothing but confusion, long and misleading in more ways than one!

Review.Contenu: I liked the product a lot, feels very solid for the price, but the repair guarantee is a bit of a bait and switch, and if I had known I couldn't register the product because I didn't buy their screen protection, I wouldn't have paid the extra for the repair guarantee, and just gotten the case itself. The repair guarantee needs to either be an easier process, or advertised more accurately.

Review.Contenu: While it looks greats the smell coming off it is toxic smelling. We have washed it with soap and have it setting outside on patio to see if the smell goes away. Hoping it does if not we will be returning it. Disappointing.

Review.Contenu: The registration process is anything but seamless and the product does not seem to work that well in that I have had more damaged screens with the product than without it and using a cheap screen protector.

Review.Titre: Unfortunately disappointed
Review.Contenu: I have used cell helmet screen protectors in the past and they have been great.  Which is why I went to them to purchase a screen protector for my new Samsung S20+.  However, this screen protector did not apply to my phone very well and I was unable to use the fingerprint to unlock my phone.  It was also very difficult to use the keyboard towards the edge of the phone.  I ended up taking it off after 3 days of having it on.

Review.Titre: Paid extra for two day fedex shipping…

Haven't heard a thing from the company and fedex says the magnets are in Tennesse.  The shipping cost more than the magnets.....That all being said, Cell Helmet customer service was excellent when I reached out to them.  I believe the mistake was on fedex and Cell Helmet was prompt to refund me.  I would try again to order when I need to. I used the product in the past and it is very innovative and good.

They would not honor my claim, but once I realized that it was really my fault, I bought a new screen and liquid pro from cellhelmet and they were really helpful to make sure I registered it correctly. They do respond quickly and were really helpful. If I ever need to file a claim again and it goes smooth, I'll improve the rating to a 5 start.
