Review.Titre: Not so sure
Review.Contenu: Customer service has been great, product not so sure.  I started with Liquid Glass/Cell Helmet and once the warranty expired I tried their glass screen protector, paying much more than I have historically for similar products, I’m thinking maybe you get what you pay for…Unfortunately, I have now paid $40 for the original glass protector and had to replace it twice for chips/cracks and/or bubbling. Each “lifetime warranty” replacement costs $10 for processing/handling, so I’m now in for $60…pretty sure I would be better off purchasing 12 $5 glass screen protectors from TJ Maxx/ Marshall’s and still have at least 8 left.

Review.Titre: not 💯 guaranteed
Review.Contenu: Bought 1st cord and charger from Verizon store thinking I was getting a top notch product. Lady told me they had 💯 percent guarantee. 3 was later charger wasn’t working. Went back to store with receipt and box. They said they couldn’t return it. Had to go through cell helmet directly. Then I had to pay 10 shipping....

Review.Titre: Cellhelmet changed my address
Review.Contenu: For some reason Cellhelmet entered an alternate address for me with a house number of 901. My house number is 932. My package was delivered to 901, they sent it back with the carrier who, for some reason, re-delivered it to 901... and they claim not to have it. So I do not have my most recent order. Cellhelmet provided a tracking number - which helped, but doesn’t get the merchandise delivered to me.

Review.Titre: The product is a great product and I…
Review.Contenu: The product is a great product and I would’ve given it a 5* review if the registration process wasn’t so tedious. A customer should be able to register multiple products on 1 phone app as opposed to having to register the product on the phone it was applied to.   Also a copy of the receipt should be enough for proof of purchase (a code on the receipt would be even better). It is ridiculous to require a copy of the receipt & picture of the item the product was applied to.  For this reason, I will probably go with a different product for our next set of phones.

Review.Titre: not Totally convinced
Review.Contenu: I sell this product but after being someone who decided to try it I haven’t been fully convinced this product works. I have watched many videos on cell helmet. My issues is that even after applying the protection to my phone my phone is still getting scratched just from normal use. Doesn’t seem very strong.

Review.Titre: Product didn't meet my expectations
Review.Contenu: Product didn't meet my expectations. First temper glass lasted 1 month or less and the second one lasted less than a week. Cracks real easy. It's my second time warranting. It's costing me $10 each time when I paid almost $50 for it 😒

Review.Titre: should disclose length of warranty on packaging
Review.Contenu: This review is not about the product itself, but it should be disclosed on the packaging that the warranty is only covered for a year.  Most people keep their phones for a minimum of two years.  You don’t learn until the end of the registration you only have 365.  I’m glad I didn’t buy the $300 coverage.

Review.Titre: New company needs to review some of the practices.
Review.Contenu: I think it is great that they have a lifetime warranty. I think the free shipping is awesome. The $9.99 for handling for a defective item is a bit much when it is a 1/3 of the cost of the item. I will not be purchasing any future products from your company due to this. I thankfully purchased my items from a Verizon store and was able to get a new receipt from them, I ponder how they honor their warranty if someone had lost their receipt and could not re-visit the location of purchase to obtain a new receipt?!

Review.Titre: I gave 3 stars overall because of the Poor product
Review.Contenu: I gave 3 stars overall because of the product. The charger cord is very poorly constructed, no wonder there is such an extended warranty. I replaced the cord and the new one is now not working after 1 week. On the upside, Your customer service was prompt and thorough.

Review.Titre: The cell helmet tempered glass already…
Review.Contenu: The cell helmet tempered glass already cracked after one week. Not happy at all with this product. First one was great lasted a few years. Maybe they have changed the product. I gave it a 3 star only because lady was nice helping me order product.

Review.Titre: Product is great for about a month and…
Review.Contenu: Product is great for about a month and then starts separating from the screen.  I have been overly attentive with the cleaning, dust removal and application and repeatedly get about 1 month out of the product.  Customer service is great but still costs me $10 to get the replacement.

Review.Titre: Inconsistency
Review.Contenu: Good products; however, not easy to work with when errors made in ordering.  I ordered a Samsung Galaxy 8 + rather than Samsung Galaxy 8 cell helmet.  I did not realize I had done this until I had opened the box.  The product was untouched and in perfect condition; but still could not be returned per cellhelmet policy.  I was told they would send the correct item at no cost.  Several weeks later, I still have not received the product promised.  My order mistake, but cellhelmet does not seem to be following through with what they said they would do.

Review.Titre: Do you need my old screen cover as proof?
Review.Contenu: Not sure if I needed to send in my broken screen cover or not. The versizon franchise store told me I would need to but it was not stated in any communication I received. Also, if my new one breaks over time... how do I get that fixed? Just keep the original receipt?

Review.Titre: I purchased this online because the one…
Review.Contenu: I purchased this online because the one I bought in the store 6 weeks ago cracked. They have a replacement warranty but you have to pay $9.99 for it. I've had other brands that have lasted me for years. I'm hoping the replacement does better then 6 weeks.

Review.Titre: I'm giving the website a 4 because it…
Review.Contenu: I'm giving the website a 4 because it keeps saying I dont have a account and let me sign in. When I do and I receive emails . I have to fill out new guest every time I go on there. I would give 300 dollar liquid glass a five star I haven't had any issues to make a claim on the liquid glass 300 dollar screen repair. I do drop phone on accident all the time and it has held up for over a year. So that's a good sign thank you for a great product. The hundred dollar  screen repair liquid glass the screen broke in 48 hours. I didn't put claim on it. I bought a new phone

Review.Titre: I purchased 2 6ft Apple Lightening…
Review.Contenu: I purchased 2 6ft Apple Lightening cords. Unfortunately 1 has stopped working on my daughters I-phone 8 and the other will only work on an I-phone 7 and not an Ipad! I was hoping to never buy a cord again for my Iphones. Unfortunately I may have to. Disappointed at this time.

Review.Titre: Satisfied with product, not customer service.
Review.Contenu: The product itself is phenomenal. The customer service and contact is horrible. They do not keep you informed via email about your order as their page says they do. When you email them your questions and concerns there is no professionalism in the response you get in return.

Review.Titre: The quality of the screen protector is…
Review.Contenu: The quality of the screen protector is great and I’ve replaced them several times after dropping my phone or getting a cracked screen. My issue is more with the ATT provider that sold me the “free lifetime warranty” for the screen protector, I bought the first one for a high price since i was told it came with free replacement warranty but soon after I order my first replacement protector I found out I’m still paying $10 every time I need it replaced. If I had known that I wouldn’t have paid $40 then additional $10 for every screen protector I order now. There are much cheaper options.

Review.Titre: I have to be honest the cell helmet…
Review.Contenu: I have to be honest the cell helmet itself is good and it saved my phone from breakage.The problem is is when my screen broke the cell helmet they sent me the wrong replacementso while the item itself is good customer service is somewhat lacking

Review.Titre: Returns are easy exchanges are not
Review.Contenu: Very strange that the company will not do an exchange for a product. You have to return it and then re-order the correct item. Lots of extra steps.

Review.Titre: Make sure you’re clear on your warranty
Review.Contenu: When I bought my cell helmet the clerk who sold it to me and installed it told me “there is a lifetime guarantee as long as you own your phone”.  Well, about a year later I noticed the screen was cracked.  My phone seemed fine, thank you so much.I took it back to the store where I bought it and was informed by the salesman that the replacement screen would COST ME $9.95.That is NOT  the way it was represented when I bought it.  Free replacement for the life of my phone was what I expected.  $9.95 is NOT FREE.If I had known I would have to PAY for the replacement I probably would not have bought it.

Review.Titre: I find the correspondence lacking and…
Review.Contenu: I find the correspondence lacking and not very timely with cellhelmet. I had a hard time trying to figure out how to submit a claim and then I waited a few days for a reply. The reply was satisfactory and helpful. I was able to fix my phone screen. I am now struggling to register the new screen for coverage protection. I keep getting an error message. Thank you for the 25% online discount but the repair shop sells the liquid glass so "begging" for a 5 star review would not be a honest review from a true customer. I have had issues in the past with my phone and I feel the other company was more timely and on top of it.Addendum: I recently received an email from the company with very clear instructions on how to register again with the company. It's like theybread my mind. They explained their hours, they are not available on weekends which I was not aware of which would make sense to my Friday email and ni response til Monday. Thank you cell helmet for the assistance!

Review.Titre: I did not like the new way to get a…
Review.Contenu: I did not like the new way to get a replacement. It seems the process is designed to discourage warranty replacements. I had to order the replacement. Then return to the purchase venue to get the screen protector installed.

Review.Titre: I wish the coverage wasn't just "A year…
Review.Contenu: I wish the coverage wasn't just "A year from purchase date". I bought my cell helmet kit when I preordered my new phone and I am missing out on the better part of a month of coverage because of this.

Review.Titre: Case does not fit and difficult return
Review.Contenu: The case I bought does not fit my phone. When I put in on it pushes down the buttons in such a way that it forces my phone into automatic restart, over and over again. I was hoping to exchange it for a case that fit better, but found that exchanges are not possible. When I attempted to return it I could not find any way to do that on the website. I attempted to call using the number provided in the emails and was unable to get assistance. I attempted to use the chat feature on the website and was unable to get any assistance. I finally reached out using instagram direct message and finally got a reply, but was still unclear about what I was supposed to do. I am hopeful that this situation can get resolved, because I was really excited about this product.

Review.Titre: You say that you have a lifetime…
Review.Contenu: You say that you have a lifetime guarantee for the screen but when we want to replace it for it getting broken, you still charge $10. What’s the point of saying a lifetime guarantee?

Review.Titre: I have had 2 glass shields
Review.Contenu: I have had 2 glass shields, both have chipped on edges, split across middle & lifted on sides & corners.  Trying warranty for third time & hopefully have better luck.  Customer service is good though

Review.Titre: Bubble Issues
Review.Contenu: I’ve used cell helmet and zagg quite often and always have problems and bubbles with the cell hemet and only once did I have it with the zagg and that was a very tiny one.  Very annoying!

Review.Titre: Scratch Remover
Review.Contenu: Had a scratch on my new Pixel 4XL, when I got the scratch I was very upset as it was a new phone. When I found cellhelmet I was relieved as their scratch remover gave me hope - I immediately ordered it. I followed all the instructions and read all the warnings. I double checked if my phone was on the "do not use on these devices" list and after it wasn't I figured I would give it a try. I followed the instructions down to the letter, and even tried it a second time (still had compound left). I did not get results, perhaps I misused the product - like not pressing hard enough.Cellhelmet has already reached out to me in efforts to resolve.While I didn't get results, I am very satisfied with Cellhelmet's customer service.

Review.Titre: Don’t waste your money
Review.Contenu: Edit: After my last review, Cell Helmet sent me a 6 ft. flat cable free of charge to replace the 10 ft. round cable I was having so many problems with. I’m happy to say the 6 footer has held up much better and still works 3 plus months later. Thank you to Cell Helmet for correcting my issue. While I cannot recommend the 10 foot cable, I’m happy with the 6 footer so far, as well as the customer service at this company. My most recent charging cord didn’t even last two months. I’ve gone through 4 chargers in less than 15 months, and I think I’m finished with this company. A crappy charger bought at a drug store would last longer, and it isn’t a real lifetime warranty since I’ve paid $40 now for my replacements. I’m so disappointed that Verizon recommended this.

Review.Titre: Replacement received was defective
Review.Contenu: Replacement received was defective. Wireless Zone was kind enough to take one off the shelf and replace defective received. Quality control should be improved.

Review.Contenu: eh. it works somewhat. I really didn’t have a bad scratch on my screen. i can see a difference but really not a big deal or worth $20 to get rid of.

Review.Titre: I completed the registration and then…
Review.Contenu: I completed the registration and then when filing a claim they can not find it. I have a copy of the receipt showing I purchased it. Still, they will not honor the warranty. Great business model very profitable I am sure. I will make sure anyone I know does not ever buy this product.Update - Several hours after my chat session and after I placed a 1-star review I received an email saying they had magically found my registration! I have gone through the process and gotten my repair voucher. While ultimately I received the warranty as sold I think the expectation of someone keeping up with a registration code to get the service paid for is a little extreme. Their system should be able to track cell phone number and the person's name because those things seldom change! So would I recommend them? No, I would not. But I bumped them to 3 stars for the follow up in finding my registration I just found it coincidental they found it after I posted a negative review.

Review.Titre: Product ok...service good overall
Review.Contenu: I got the liquid glass on my new iPhone the day after I got it, not being told that I should get additional screen protector on phone because it would still allow scratches to happen, my phone screen now has scratches on it not and I take very good care of my phone. I contacted cell helmet about this issue and they no longer carry the scratch remover kit, which was upsetting, and they told me the only way to fix was to put in claim and get screen replaced...these r very small and minor scratches but I would have gotten a regular screen protector as well if I would have known it could still get scratches just from simple use. I also feel like it took a while to get emailed back with a solution. I will say that I was pleased with the customer service when I did get ahold of someone and they were nice to give me a discount on tempered glass screen protector to prevent more scratches from occurring. I will not be replacing screen as of yet but if it gets worse I will most definitely be putting in a claim.

Review.Titre: the scratches on my phone we're minor… doesn't work

Review.Titre: I have tried to register my device…
Review.Contenu: I have tried to register my device several times over the last ten days using the app without success.  It does not work.  I tried to register the device on the Cellhelmet website and was unable to do so, as it won't work for phones.  Something is fishy.  I have emailed the company, but no response as of yet.  The product may work, but it seems that there is a scam in registering the device, which would make the warranty invalid if not completed. My experience is very similar to the other user rating who purchased the liquid glass at uBreakIFix one day ago.  Update:  I emailed Cellhelmet on Thursday, December 26th as suggested in the comment from Cellhelmet, but as of December 31, 2019, I have yet to receive any response.  Something is not right and I am cancelling two additional   liquid glass pro plus that I had set aside for me at UBreakiFix.January 2, 2019:  I am updating the rating based on my contact from Cellhelmet today.  They did process the registration, so I should be all set.  It took too long, but I am confident that they followed through.

Review.Titre: **Review Edited** No Customer Service for an exchange
Review.Contenu: My Verizon store sent in my warranty claim for me to replace the glass shield for an iPhone 8+.  They downloaded the proper receipt for that item but accidentally marked the wrong product in the drop down menu.  "Honest mistake" on their part.  So, the wrong item was shipped to me, an iPad4 screen instead of iPhone 8+.  Cellhelmet never even checked that their was an mistake in the Warranty Claim paperwork.  Contacted Cellhelmet and explained everything to them.  The operator who was very pleasant said that the store did send the correct receipt but marked the wrong product in the drop down menu. I offered to return the wrong product in an exchange, which to me makes PERFECT SENSE ..  The operator said they would not make the exchange and I would have to purchase another screen and apologized for the inconvenience.  Now I'm stuck with a screen I have no use for and have to pay "again" for another iPhone 8+ screen replacement.  NO CUSTOMER SERVICE FOR SUCH AN EASY EXCHANGE TO HAPPEN.  VERY DISSATISFIED WITH THE WHOLE EXPERIENCE....**** "Judy" from Customer Support contacted me and apologized for the lack of options that were initially given to me. She gave me a few options and I ended up getting a full refund from my order. My replacement glass for my phone is on the way.  Judy seemed very sincere and offered me any assistance in the future.  I am grateful that this "bad" experience did turn out for the best.  Thank you.........******

Review.Titre: Adhesive does not stick to Leather
Review.Contenu: Love the device but the adhesive does not stick to a leather dashboard.

Review.Titre: I bought a new Nokia 3.1 plus on Feb
Review.Contenu: I bought a new Nokia 3.1 plus on Feb. 21, 2019. Bought the $40 liquid glass screen protector on Feb. 23, 2019 from^he Cricket store, and had the girl working there put it on my phone. I thought well this will be good if I  drop it, at least it shouldn't break. Fast forward to about the middle of March. I suddenly had a huge scratch come up. Note I don't keep this in my pocket or purse. I only carry it in my hand, with a popsocket on. I went to Cricket and asked, they said that it doesn't stop scratches, just keeps from breaking. A bit disappointing but ok. Fast forward to today, April 11, 2019. I get out of the car, it fell 2.5 feet if even that far and shattered the screen, not just cracks but hard busted spots that will cut you, busted! I called he Celkhelmet and the girl said I wasn't registered... I had the email  and app to prove I was indeed registered. But they said hat regardless I would have to pay for repairs submit the receipt and then they would verify it and make a decision! Uhm, no! It should not  be have to make a decision as the claid was made less than 2 months after purchasing! I paid Nokia to repair my phone, then submitted my claim to cellh3lmet. Hopefully they will stand behind their product and send me my payment back. I am disappointed that my screen busted when their tests say they dropped a phone on concrete and it didn't bust until it hit 21 feet high and mine fell from less than 3 and shattered. Will buy a screen protector or case from now on!

Review.Titre: My case did not come with a PIN
Review.Contenu: The iPhone case I ordered and received did not come with a PIN number to activate the warranty. I emailed customer service twice with my order number to see if it could be provided to me. I didn’t hear back. However, once I completed a review on this site I immediately received a call from the company. They explained they previously did email me, but for some reason I didn’t receive them. They explain to me that the case I ordered did not come with a warranty and therefore it did not come with a pin card. Because their cases with warranties are called “Pro” it can be confusing when ordering for the iPhone Pro. After checking my order, I had incorrectly ordered the case without a warranty. They offered exchanges and replacements to meet my needs but, I ultimately decided just to keep what I purchased. Customer service team was friendly and accommodating to try to improve my experience. My previous case purchases had good customer service and I appreciate them reaching out this time.

Got our helmets within a few days.

Review.Titre: First purchase of lightning cable…
Review.Contenu: First purchase of lightning cable stopped working pretty quickly, and I was surprised at first to see 9.99 for replacement. However, I contacted customer service via chat and they quickly waived the fee and I had a brand new one in two days! Verizon wireless advertised lifetime warranty but failed to mention the 9.99 fee. I’d buy again....

Review.Titre: Awesome product
Review.Contenu: Awesome product! It’s sturdy and yet smooth. The grip is great! My only comment is that pressing the power button twice for Apple Pay is hard cause the case is pretty thick. Other than that, amazing case!

Review.Titre: cellhelmet reached out to fix my problem
Review.Contenu: UPDATE:  cellhelmet reviewed my comments and offered me a free replacement cord since the original one failed so soon.  Thank you for backing your product. I'm happy with the follow-up!My lightning charger cord failed after 4 weeks of use.  Now I need to pay $9.99 for a warranty replacement.  It seems like you could have in-store exchange for something like this which was obviously defective.

Review.Titre: Chat Issues
Review.Contenu: I understand the efficiency of using the online chat feature but the icon should not be visible if some on is not available to chat. I didn’t  receive notifications when someone did respond so we played phone tag for a while. (Not sure if that was my phone or the program). Also it would be nice to talk to someone when chat isn’t available. However Ashley was very quick to resolve the issue and very respectful. She gets two thumbs up!!ThanksJosh

Review.Titre: Pretty good but theres cheaper
Review.Contenu: The screen protector looks great and does not distort imaging, but its pretty brittle.  Mine cracked while it was sitting in my truck.  I guess it got hot and cracked.  Customer service acted very quickly and sent out a new one very fast, but I feel like I shouldn't have to pay 10 bucks for a new one when mine only lasted a couple weeks and wasn't even dropped or anything.

Review.Titre: Great Customer Service but...
Review.Contenu: The product (lightening cable) lasted about a year before the end cracked, HOWEVER, it was covered by the lifetime warranty. The customer service in getting a replacement cable was second to none. It was simple, fast and courteous. I had my new cable within two days. Would I recommend Cell Helmet? Absolutely! I love my lightening cable.

Review.Titre: Get link from support chat to file warranty claim
Review.Contenu: My cellhelmet tempered glass on my iPhone 12 Pro cracked after 5 months.  I used the SUPPORT CHAT on their website and was given a link to file a warranty claim.  Sent them a picture of the box & receipt along with $9.99 to cover shipping and processing.  Hope this one lasts longer.

Review.Titre: Getting my replacement cords was smooth…p
Review.Contenu: Getting my replacement cords was smooth and quick. Very impressive. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is due to the fact that I have contacted Cell Helmet twice via email from the Contact section on the web page and they have not responded after three weeks.

Review.Titre: Confusing website, otherwise good service
Review.Contenu: Figuring out how to access the warranty on my screen protector was not easy from the cell helmet website. This required emailing the customer service people and waiting for them to respond. After that, it was very smooth. The cell helmet screen protector flawlessly prevented damage to my new phone.

Review.Titre: Liquid cell helmet
Review.Contenu: Purchased the best cell helmet first/liquid, that cracked. The iphone face was replaced, and covered by cell helmet. I then purchased the "hard" cell helmet,  which cracked. I just received the replacement for $9.99, but have not taken it to Verizon store to have it put on yet.Even though I'm  a little upset with the quality of the cell helmet,  I'm impressed with the follow up for replacement.

Review.Titre: At no point in my transaction was I…
Review.Contenu: At no point in my transaction was I notified that my item wouldn't be shipped for 2 weeks.  Although the website brags fast shipping.  I had to contact company when it would be shipped after waiting one week from when payment was debited from my account. I never recieved an email that it was shipped.  It just showed up in my mailbox.

Review.Titre: After buying 3 cheap portable charges…
Review.Contenu: After buying 3 cheap portable charges and breaking within 45 days i decided to invest a little more money and bought the 10200 mAh for $60 at the Cricket store. Well first the cable broke off in my phone after 40 days and on day 45 (yes just like the cheapies) the unit would no longer charge and was useless. Thank goodness for the lifetime warranty. I received a new one in 4 days. So I'm giving it a try once again

Review.Titre: Very happy with warranty lens protector…
Review.Contenu: Very happy with warranty lens protector replacement. Was easy to order and shipped the same day. Only gripe I have from given a 5 star rating was the $9.99/ea shipping and handling fee. I don't have issue with shipping fee which was shipped normal USPS delivery costing you maybe $1.50 - $2.00 tops. So I feel it's not truly a lifetime warranty if I'm paying extra $8 roughly. I feel we are paying probably your cost to make one.

Review.Titre: Good deal but buttons don’t work.
Review.Contenu: Though I got it for a good deal it would be a waste of time to even mail it back but the up and down button on the case does not even work. Maybe it’s the design for the particular case.Update:::I got it replaced and it works now. Thanks for the customer service. 1 star to 4 star.

Review.Titre: I like that the screen cover protects…
Review.Contenu: I like that the screen cover protects by phone screen, because I gone through a few of the protectors, and haven’t damaged my phone. I had a privacy protector last time, but that makes it hard to show Grandbaby photos to a group of friends. So this replacement is a regular one. Happy about the service, and replacement ease. Thank you.

Review.Titre: It works very well
Review.Contenu: It works very well. It is not perfect or indestructible but I would have shattered the glass about 6 times already without it. I have a case on it and it fell about 7 times and didn't crack. this last time it did and as stated they will pay the repair cost so all in all very good investment for the money.

Review.Titre: Very good product with only a couple…
Review.Contenu: Very good product with only a couple problems. First one is that when my protector arrived in the mail it was already cracked. Another problem I have is they crack very easily. One foot drop was able to crack my protector in 3 different places. Other than the manufacturing problem and easy to break problem I'd say it's a really good protector to use

Review.Titre: Customer Service - Filing Claim
Review.Contenu: While trying to file a claim there were some difficulties in trying to reach someone via phone, however, I would highly recommend using the live chat feature on the website, someone responded to me in less than a minute and was very helpful and directed me to exactly what I needed

Review.Titre: The warranty replacement website is less…
Review.Contenu: The warranty replacement website is less than easily accessible.

Review.Titre: Great Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I originally left a bad review as these expensive products cracked x2 on us.  CellHellmet contacted me and made it right.  I appreciate customer service that cares!  Give them a chance and try their product.  Reach out with concerns and they will do their best to work with you

Review.Titre: After one more crack
Review.Contenu: After one more crack, I felt I needed to replace the tempered glass cover for my aging, but well-loved and perfectly functioning iPhone SE. A local cellphone store had every other size imaginable, but none for the SE; told me they could not order one, either. I ordered online directly, received in about 2 days. My careful application of the new glass left one small edge not perfectly adhered, but I think it's fine. BTW, The Cellhelmet warranty never seems to actually work (I have numerous Cellhelmet products) but I will say that - in spite of cracks in the protective glass, the phone underneath was protected perfectly.

Review.Titre: Liquid Glass has been on phone 3 months-no issues
Review.Contenu: Seems to be a great product. Only issue is their warranty is not as long as some of their competitors and they don’t offer a reapply option. I like that their product comes in a vial so I can see that it is actually going into my phone. So far so good. I’ve had it on my phone and watch for about 3’months now with no issues.

Review.Titre: Product is nice but not certain it…
Review.Contenu: Product is nice but not certain it lived up to the expectations I had for it. It did cover up those itsy bitsy superficial scratches but nothing for those moderate superficial ones and those are the ones I hoped the product would help with. Overall it's a good concealer for those tiny scratches on your screen.

Review.Titre: I like your product and am very…
Review.Contenu: I like your product and am very thankful for the lifetime replacement warranty. The customer service rep was very helpful in directing me  thru the process for having my cellhelmet replaced and I received my replacement within a few days. The entire process was quick & painless.

Review.Titre: Great customer service
Review.Contenu: First, customer service (Lucy) was excellent!  I told her my glass screen saver was chipped, that I didn't have the receipt, and she was extremely helpful in giving me the information needed to order a replacement.  She even gave me a code so that I would not have to pay for shipping-wonderful!  Second, I am a bit bummed that my expensive tempered glass screen saver (on a new phone with a hard case) chipped less than a month after purchase.  Happy for the free replacement, but not happy with the product.  Hopefully, just a freak defect.

Review.Titre: It is taking too long to resolve an…
Review.Contenu: It is taking too long to resolve an order issue. It would be helpful to speak via telephone rather than delayed emails.Update: customer service rep called me to resolve issue and follow-up experience was excellent!

Review.Titre: It s a good deal
Review.Contenu: It s a good deal ,for life. Sent all the info that they needed,got the new cover in about a week.Thhe only thing I didnt like is that it was 10.00 shipping.A item that was 40.00 anyway should have been alittle cheaper in the shipping.

Review.Titre: Bare wires
Review.Contenu: This the second charging cable i have had to have replaced for the same reason. Bare wires became exposed at the iPhone end of the cable. I believe the cable had very easy use, nothing that should be considered hard use.

Review.Titre: Purchased a wall charger from Verizon
Review.Contenu: Purchased a wall charger from Verizon, worked fine for about 1.5 months then would no longer turbo-charge and was sending sparks out of every outlet I plugged it into. Verizon would not do anything for me because of CellHelmet's warranty. Went online and was disappointed to see a replacement fee since I only had it for a short time. Ordered anyway but called customer service the next day and they told me they'd credit the fee. Did have to call back a week later bc the refund never went through, but after the 2nd call I received the replacement fee refund in a couple days. Pretty good service IMO.

Review.Titre: Seems great so far
Review.Contenu: Seems great so far, and I love the guarantee. It is not tested though, so I can't comfortably give the product 5 stars. If I wasn't asked to review the product so quickly, it probably would have gotten 5 stars a couple of months down the road.

Review.Titre: Phone cases are great
Review.Contenu: Phone cases are great. Paid for 2 day shipping. After a week contacted them and they said sorry new iPhone launch got them backed up. Really? However they did refund the 2 day shipping fee. Nice product but not sure on priority of the customer

Review.Titre: They are good about replacing the…
Review.Contenu: They are good about replacing the screen protectors for my phone but I don’t believe the screen  protectors themselves are all that good the first one on this transaction that they sent me was broken in the mail which is no fault of their‘s and the one that I have on my phone has only been on there a week and it already has a small crack in it and I’ve only had it  on the phone for about a week so it will cost me another $10 or should I say 995 to get another replacement one I don’t know what to say  I just wish there was a solution to this Problem the screen protector is cracked in the same place as the last one was

Review.Titre: The first product I received was a welcome replacement
Review.Contenu: The first product I received did not adhere well to the phone. However, when I contacted the company they readily provided a replacement for which I am grateful – both for their speedy concern for a customer as well as for a replacement

Review.Titre: Never got my product - but they fixed that later
Review.Contenu: Update: Tl;dr - I would definitely buy cell helmet for every phone I have IF I can be sure I won't need to deal with the support teamLonger review -  After posting my original review, the cell helmet team got in touch with me and sent me a new cover. The initial response from customer service was a little...pushy. But once the product actually got delivered they were patient and did not bother me.The product itself - I LOVED the cover. It's light, has good grip and takes a pock socket very nicely.I dropped it a couple of times and while the case has markings and some damage from that - my phone is absolutely A OK. Have been using it for almost 3 months now with ZERO COMPLAINTSOriginal Review:I haven’t received my product. And even after raising a complaint with both USPS and cell helmet, the response was just to wait. In the mean time I have a new phone that’s been accumulating scratches. I can’t say anything about the product though - because I’ve never seen or used it.

Review.Titre: Works well
Review.Contenu: Works well. Application is harder than other competitors. Not as smooth. Seems as if there isnt enough liquid in vial to spread over front and back of phone. Even so, once product is applied it absorbs rapidly leaving a LOT of streaks to buff out.

Review.Titre: It is ridiculous in my judgement that I…
Review.Contenu: It is ridiculous in my judgement that I had to pay shipping twice for one package containing two chargers.These chargers break easily.For the price they are not worth the value.

Review.Titre: Feels nice.  Tough? Registration is difficult via the app but good via email after a chat.
Review.Contenu: After application the screen felt exceptionally smooth and responsive as well as very clear.  Streaking was not there at all.  Fingerprints and smears were rare and when they did happen they wiped off easily.  I can't really tell how tough it is as a week later I dropped my phone on a tile floor breaking the screen.  Registration with the app leaves much to be desired as I tried a dozen times over 3 weeks and all failed.  That said I chatted online with the company and was able to register via email, a little clumsy but it works.  Now to get my phone fixed and submit the claim, hoping it all goes well but so far I have a good feeling.

Review.Titre: I couldn't figure out how to get a…
Review.Contenu: I couldn't figure out how to get a replacement screen cover for my phone, when I already bought the lifetime subscription of them when I bought my first one. I had to email customer service to help figure this out.

Review.Titre: Warranty Replacement
Review.Contenu: Overall, I really like the cellhelmet products. However, the shipping for warranty replacements was very long. When my cellhelmet charger broke, I was disappointed to pay $10 for shipping for a replacement that took 10 days to arrive.

Review.Titre: Could be a 5
Review.Contenu: Could be a 5, Just not had enough experience with the company.  I definitely love the products I have used so far. Cellhelmet Screen protector and the cleaner.  Shipping was fast, product securely packaged. and follow up e-m ail was was great.

Review.Titre: Too many hoops
Review.Contenu: Way too many hoops to jump through. Updated 11-11-19. I did complete the registration process. I was told about 3 weeks ago my reimbursement check. I have yet to receive the check. Update. I have received my reimbursement check. So

Review.Titre: Bought 2 recharging cables (at…
Review.Contenu: Bought 2 recharging cables (at different times); both only worked for about three months. Had trouble navigating website to get replacements. Used live chat with Eli was very helpful in getting the replacements.

Review.Titre: The lifetime warranty is disappointing…
Review.Contenu: The lifetime warranty is disappointing in that the size I needed had been discontinued at my local store. The replacement was available directly from cellhelmet and arrived quickly.

Review.Titre: Eli went the extra mile
Review.Contenu: Polite but told me I wasn’t registered, despite my registration number. Finally, Eli went the extra mile, recognized the older type code and validated my registration. Thank you Eli!

Review.Titre: Product is GREAT
Review.Contenu: Product is GREAT, Customer Service is GREAT, but the cost of shipping a warrantied item seems pretty high... for a screen saver that weighs little to nothing, it was shipping in a box and cost $9.99 for shipping...

Review.Titre: Good Agent / Bummer on repair
Review.Contenu: Agent was very responsive. Found out I have to pay up front to get phone repaired then I have to wait and see if I get my money back. would be a 5 star if I got the money up front to fix my phone first.

Review.Titre: This is my first time having to file a…
Review.Contenu: This is my first time having to file a claim with this company, I will say that the service itself is nice and they stand behind their product. However the process is rather cumbersome, and for the purpose it's not very efficient. The wait time for reimbursement is a little long seeing that the reimbursement is to repair your damaged phone. I'm currently 2 weeks in on a process I thought would take 10 days in total. Never the less the associate Lucy that assisted me today was exceptionally helpful! She was able to pull up my account and verify that I had done everything right and in order she also helped me register my new product. Regardless of the wait time for reimbursement customer service is superb.

Review.Titre: I wish that I could have reached out by…
Review.Contenu: I wish that I could have reached out by a phone call and talked to a person to make the replacement process more convenient for me. Love your product and your guarantee.

Review.Titre: Works like a charm!
Review.Contenu: Works like a charm, but it will probably wear out just like all the rest did. No change in design that I see. Others lasted about two years. Are my expectations too high?

Review.Titre: The process was incredibly easy and the…
Review.Contenu: The process was incredibly easy and the replacement glass was delivered in a timely manner.  Only reason it is not a 5 star is I had to pay $10 for something I thought was completely guaranteed.

Review.Titre: Great Product!!! Lousy servicr
Review.Contenu: Great Product!!!Lousy one of the worst customer service!!!!Still trying to register my product even though i sent numerous e mails!!Phone number service non existed for help!!!

Review.Titre: Great so far!!
Review.Contenu: Ordering was very easy and received my product within a couple of days.  Love not having the icky glass screen protector on my phone!!!! Easy to apply and it feels natural!!! So far I love it!!!

Review.Titre: Customer service email correspondence…
Review.Contenu: Customer service email correspondence could be faster and it needs to be easier to get somebody on the phone to talk to like it use to be In previous years. Once I found the chat feature that was nice. Only reason for the 4 instead of 5 stars was that once my package said it shipped it took 3 or 4 days of the tracking information saying that only a label has been created and usps hasn't received the item yet. Had to contact customer service again and they contacted the wharehouse manager to get the hold up fixed.  All in all, it was a pretty good process especially for a warranty item. Only other thing I can think of is you need to have more of your screen covers in stock. Saw a lot of out of stock privacy screens. Maybe that's because of covid and stuff i don't know but just something to note. Thanks!

Review.Titre: It took a little while to resolve my…
Review.Contenu: It took a little while to resolve my issue, but it was eventually handled (why 4 starts and not 5).  Another plus with cellhelmet is there was no need to return the damage screen saver.

Review.Titre: Warranty is only for one year.
Review.Contenu: Hard to know how well it protects, but it applied easily with no negative impacts (i.e., screen is still as clear as new). BUT WARNING: the warrant is only for one year, so I ding them a star.

Review.Titre: It didnt work all that well to protect…
Review.Contenu: It didnt work all that well to protect my screen but I didnt get my 300$ back from repairing the broken screen without having to jump thru too many hoops which was pleasantly unexpected:)

Review.Titre: Product delivered on time and in good…
Review.Contenu: Product delivered on time and in good condition but no confirmation email after purchase was sent.  Plus side when I sent an email to cellhelmet they did respond with 48-72 hours

Review.Titre: Your replacement system is wonderful…
Review.Contenu: Your replacement system is wonderful and really easy to use. The fact that my screen broke within 2 weeks of having it with your liquid glass protector dissapoints me though.

Review.Titre: 4 star product
Review.Contenu: Reasons: Being forced to rate and haven't had it long enough. Also dropped it once and the case was scratched, so that's concerning. Cool case design though.

Review.Titre: Screen Proctection
Review.Contenu: This is the second time I have had to order a new screen protector from Cellhelmet.  Delivery is super fast and the $10 replacement is a great way to keep your phone protected.

Review.Titre: Great customer service
Review.Contenu: I'm gonna share my experience with cellhelmet.  I bought the liquid, applied it on my cellphone and registered the warranty.. The cellhelmet product is good. My phone was used without the screen protector.. Approximately 8 months later my cellphone screen developed a slight scratch, that same scratch got bigger over time.. I payed to fix the screen and applied for the warranty.. Cell brokers who apparently handle the insurance side denied my claim telling that the front camera picture was not done correctly.. I was furious.. Called them many times tried to resolve the issues, but to no avail.. After posting a negative review representative from cellhelmet reopened the case for me and got me reimbursed.. I HONESTLY DO LIKE THE PRODUCT and definitely buy it again.. I hope the company does better job of picking the insurance company that handles the claims.

Review.Titre: I just purchased 2 cellhelmets  in…
Review.Contenu: I just purchased 2 cellhelmets  in november and they both had to be replacedand I had to pay $10 each for $20 and just purchased

Review.Titre: Case is great price and seems to be…
Review.Contenu: Case is great price and seems to be strong. Only thing I would change is making it a little more grippy. Its hard plastic so its kinda slick in your hands.

Review.Titre: Very glad you offer replacement…
Review.Contenu: Very glad you offer replacement warranty for glass screen protector. My old one was cracked. You honored your request replacement warranty. Thank you.

Review.Titre: It’s great product but should be free
Review.Contenu: It’s great however I wish it was cheaper! It says you have a lifetime warranty but doesn’t say you pay each time yours cracks. That’s not in the fine print!

Review.Titre: I like the phone case and like that
Review.Contenu: I like the phone case and like that, however we also bought the screen covering at the Wireless store and my daughter says she has 2 scratches on her screen.

Review.Titre: Offers very good protection
Review.Contenu: Offers very good protection, but has issues with adhering to the full face of the phone.  Will not stay in full contact with the upper left corner

Review.Titre: They forgot to process the invoice and…
Review.Contenu: They forgot to process the invoice and it took 3 weeks to get here and they sent the wrong size . They did end up reimbursing me about a month later

Review.Titre: Eventually got it right (2 “customer…
Review.Contenu: Eventually got it right (2 “customer service” calls before the 3rd one sent the right product) Very confusing….

Review.Titre: Can’t register for iPhone
Review.Contenu: Having a hard time finishing registration of the cell helmet altitude case for my iphone12. The directions were not clear for an iPhone

Review.Titre: No hassle life time warranty
Review.Contenu: No hassle life time warranty, cords are great, but nothing last forever. So for a fraction of the original cost. You get a replacement.

Review.Titre: Cable not that strong.
Review.Contenu: I like it, the cable it’s pretty strong but no more than a month and just like any regular cable and the wire connector brakes.

Review.Titre: Good Product, Horrible Tech
Review.Contenu: Product is great, except for registering the product for the warranty. I'm not able to register it, the app keeps crashing

Review.Titre: Was easy to order but wish I received…
Review.Contenu: Was easy to order but wish I received confirmation email and or tracking so I knew the order was placed and went through ok.

Review.Titre: First replacement necessary after three…
Review.Contenu: First replacement necessary after three weeks. The replacement came quickly and all is well. Thanks.

Review.Titre: good warranty
Review.Contenu: The tempered glass was damaged by a hand that hit the phone while gesturing. It cost $5 shipping to replace. Good warranty.

Review.Titre: My phone screen saver came quickly and…
Review.Contenu: My phone screen saver came quickly and was easy to put on.

Review.Titre: Calling customer service was not a good…
Review.Contenu: Calling customer service was not a good experience. If you don't have good internet connection, forget getting help.

Review.Titre: Satisfied experience
Review.Contenu: I used the chat option on the Cell Helmet web page. My questions were answered promptly and the staff was very helpful.

Review.Titre: It took a little bit to figure out how…
Review.Contenu: It took a little bit to figure out how to order my replacement glass online.  However, shipping was lightning fast.

Review.Titre: Had an issue with the sticky plate not…
Review.Contenu: Had an issue with the sticky plate not holding to the phone at the first use. They are sending me a new one no charge.

Review.Titre: Seem to work well
Review.Contenu: Seem to work well.  Only been on the phone for a few days.  Time will tell.

Review.Titre: I would like to say that I have never…
Review.Contenu: I would like to say that I have never had such incredible customer support like the gentleman that helped me. I was having difficulty registering my product and not only did he reach out to me and called me; he also sent me an email and walked me through the process. I told him that he could give classes on businesses giving great customer service because it’s rare these days to find someone that wants to be helpful. I would rate him 100 out of 5 if I could. Fantastic and much appreciated!! Kim Daniel-Richardson

Review.Titre: I love my charger
Review.Contenu: I love my charger! It folds beautifully and it’s a great for traveling!

Review.Titre: Cellhemet made shopping online easy and…
Review.Contenu: Cellhemet made shopping online easy and their price was better than when I went into a local store.

Review.Titre: I had purchased a liquid glass…
Review.Contenu: I had purchased a liquid glass protection last year around this time under the impression that it was a lifetime warranty. Not to go into all the details I had to replace my device thinking the liquid glass would carry over to the new device which it doesn't after explaining my situation the company gave me a coupon for 50% off  towards a new liquid glass.

Review.Titre: Prompt lifetime warranty as stated
Review.Contenu: When I purchased my cell helmet tempered glass screen saver last year, I was told to save my receipt and it came with a lifetime warranty.It was so easy to go to the website and complete the procedure. I promptly received confirmation and shipping notices. When I received the wrong size - I chatted my problem and was notified that I will receive the correct one soon .I am happy and highly recommend this company.

Review.Titre: Fast delivery
Review.Contenu: Fast delivery, great communication all the way to delivery. Excellent cell case design, fit like a glove. Artwork on back very precise. Good display protection, comfortable grip. Way to go Cellhelmet. Mike

Review.Titre: Customer service was great
Review.Contenu: What made my experience great was customer service   Aaron put together a 35% discount at Checkout for me as a return customer.   I ordered replacement liquid glass and a Turquoise hard cover for my Samsung 20S Note Ultra.  shipping to UBreakIFix at 501 Westport Ave, Norwalk CT 06851. I   need an appointment for either Monday 2/27 or Tuesday 2/28.Linda DePonte

Review.Titre: Prompt and helpful service
Review.Contenu: Aaron replied promptly to my query re: whether or not I should open the replacement tempered glass I ordered.  The picture on the package didn't match the description of the product and I was concerned if I opened the pkg could it be returned if not the correct one.

Review.Titre: Amazing customer service!!
Review.Contenu: I am amazed at how wonderful the customer service I received was. I had accidentally ordered the wrong case and promptly contacted customer service. They made sure to cancel my order and I was able to order the correct case. It was all done through email and the response time was so quick and they were so helpful.

Review.Titre: Had a charging block with a short and…
Review.Contenu: Had a charging block with a short and is under cell helmet lifetime guarantee. Went to US Cellular and they filed the claim for the replacement immediately only paying for the shipping charges. Got immediate notification the product was being shipped by cell helmet. Couldn’t be more pleased since this product lasted almost 7 years.

Review.Titre: I chatted with Eli
Review.Contenu: I chatted with Eli. He was quite helpful in the problem I had. I accidentally requested and received the wrong phone charger cables when I put in a claim. He saw the original receipt and automatically put the new order in to send the correct cables to me. And I didn’t have to worry about sending the incorrect cables back. In a world full of so many problems, issues and headaches… Eli made this easy.

Review.Titre: Damaged USB Cord
Review.Contenu: I purchased a USB cord from a local Verizon store in my neighborhood.  After using it for about three weeks it broke. Instead of simply giving me a new USB cord, I was told I would have to contact the vendor Cellhelmet. They were quick to respond and after looking at pictures of the damaged USB cord and my receipt they agreed to send me a new one and waived the shipping charges.  Excellent customer service!

Review.Titre: Customer service is very responsive
Review.Contenu: Customer service is very responsive I couldn’t be more appreciative of all the help I received in deciding what to purchase. My only complaint would be there isn’t enough options for coverage for the back of a phone. I wish they made a liquid glass for the back screen but I was happy to find out that the case would cover the back. Overall love this company

Review.Titre: Great service
Review.Contenu: Aron and Eli were very helpful and very professional:I had a bad experience with glass developing a huge bubble within 6 months due to the way it was put on iPhone. At the retailers ,I reached out to cell helmet ,the maker of the product,They helped me with replacement I. In A timely manner they were both very friendly . Premier cust service .thank you cell helmet

Review.Titre: Cell helmet has AWESOME customer…
Review.Contenu: Cell helmet has AWESOME customer service!!  The photo case I received was not great but before I even contacted them, they reached out to re do with better picture placement etc.Received new one ….BEAUTIFUL!!My husband will LOVE the photo phone case!!THANKS SO MUCH!!!!
